vote.text: Amendment SA 2960 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2960 proposed by Senator Cruz. (consideration: CR S2180; text: CR S2180) To make a technical amendment.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2960 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
